package fetchingMiddleCharacter;
public class middleCharacterString {
	static String getMiddleChars(String message)
	{
		StringBuilder builder=new StringBuilder();
		System.out.println(message.length());
		int mid=message.length()/2;
		System.out.println(mid);
		builder.append(message.charAt(mid-1));
		builder.append(message.charAt(mid));
		return builder.toString();
	}

}

import java.util.Scanner;
import userMainCode.UserMainCode;
public class FetchingMiddlecharacter {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter the message with even length to find middle characters");
		String message=scanner.next();
		String middleChars=UserMainCode.getMiddleChars(message);
		System.out.println(middleChars);
	}

}
